channel.title: Rune-Server Cant Help Me, Can You?
channel.description:
I Want To Make A Specified Area, So When You DIE In That Area, You DONT Lose Your Items And Get Teled To Another Specified Area,
Posted On Rune-Server Twice With No Reply's, Can Someone Here Help Me?
Also, When You Eat On My Server (Any Food) Your Hp Doesnt Heal Past 80, Any Help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2007, 01:20:59 PM[/size][hr]Please Some, Need Help, Preferbly Java Is My Bitch

item.title: Rune-Server Cant Help Me, Can You?

I Added That as A Public Void, But You Still Die And Lose Items Etc, When In That Area[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2007, 04:11:41 PM[/size][hr]Help?

item.title: Rune-Server Cant Help Me, Can You?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

To make it easier add it with the method:

Lets start it:

public void areaName() { if(absX >= 3344 && absX <= 3383 && absY >= 9620 && absY <= 9659 && IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1) { teleportToX = X; teleportToY = Y; sendMessage("Oh dear your dead"); NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]); playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); refreshSkills(); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Server Cant Help Me, Can You?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

That’s really mean, it made me feel bad. Thus hesitating from posting on this thread. There are smart people on these forums, everyone has their strong or weak points.

Well for your first problem, you have to outline, the X and Y’s of where this area is, the area being if you die you don’t lose items.

You can either put it into the method itself, as in:

if(absX etc.

Or make a method that returns true or false, being a boolean, (there are others, just incase the un-named decides to post).

So:

public void areaName() {
if(absX >= SW && absX <= NE && absY >= SW && absY <=NE && heightLevel == 1) {

Once you have outline the X and Y’s post again, so i can tell you what to do next.

As for your food problem, i really don’t know, thus being my weak point.

Read full topic
